name: leon
description: Server, skills and web app of the Leon personal assistant

scripts.test: npm run test:json && npm run test:over-http && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run train en && cross-env PIPENV_PIPFILE=bridges/python/src/Pipfile LEON_NODE_ENV=testing jest --forceExit --silent --projects test/unit/unit.jest.json && npm run train
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:nlp-modules && npm run test:e2e:modules
scripts.test:e2e:modules: ts-node scripts/run-clean-test-dbs.js && npm run train en && cross-env PIPENV_PIPFILE=bridges/python/src/Pipfile LEON_NODE_ENV=testing jest --forceExit --silent --verbose --projects test/e2e/modules/e2e.modules.jest.json && ts-node scripts/run-clean-test-dbs.js && npm run train
scripts.test:e2e:nlp-modules: npm run train en && cross-env PIPENV_PIPFILE=bridges/python/src/Pipfile LEON_NODE_ENV=testing jest --forceExit --silent --verbose --setupTestFrameworkScriptFile=./test/paths.setup.js test/e2e/nlp-modules.spec.js && npm run train
scripts.test:over-http: npm run generate:skills-endpoints && npm run train && cross-env PIPENV_PIPFILE=bridges/python/src/Pipfile LEON_NODE_ENV=testing LEON_HOST=http://localhost LEON_PORT=1338 LEON_HTTP_API_KEY=72aeb5ba324580963114481144385d7179c106fc jest --forceExit --silent --verbose --notify=false --bail --collectCoverage=false test/e2e/over-http.spec.js
scripts.dev:server: npm run train && npm run generate:skills-endpoints && cross-env LEON_NODE_ENV=development tsc-watch --noClear --onSuccess "nodemon"
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:server
scripts.build:server: npm run delete-dist:server && npm run train && npm run generate:skills-endpoints && tsc && resolve-tspaths && shx rm -rf server/dist/core server/dist/package.json && shx mv -f server/dist/server/src/* server/dist && shx rm -rf server/dist/server && shx mkdir -p server/dist/tmp
scripts.start:tcp-server: cross-env PIPENV_PIPFILE=tcp_server/src/Pipfile pipenv run python tcp_server/src/main.py
scripts.docker:check: docker run --rm --interactive leon-ai/leon npm run check
